title.justification: This is the title of the paper as provided by the user
title.quote: A Bayesian Non-Stationary Heteroskedastic Time Series Model for Multivariate Critical Care Data

extractions.description: The paper proposes a multivariate GARCH model for non-stationary health time series by modifying the variance of observations in the standard state space model and validates it using synthetic data and real ICU data from Montreal and MIMIC-III datasets.

type.justification: The paper validates the proposed model on synthetic data and real ICU data
type.quote: We validate our model on synthetic data, and then use it to analyze a data set obtained from an intensive care unit in a Montreal hospital. We further show that our proposed models offer better performance, in terms of WAIC, than standard state space models.

name.justification: The paper focuses on modeling non-stationary health time series data
name.quote: We propose a multivariate GARCH model for non-stationary health time series by modifying the variance of the observations of the standard state space model.

name.justification: The paper applies the model to critical care patient data to ensure better patient care and outcome
name.quote: Modeling such data accurately would help to ensure better patient care and outcome.

name.justification: The paper leverages Bayesian methods for inference
name.quote: We follow the Bayesian paradigm to perform the inference procedure.
